abstract.t: This document analyzes the common parameters that are essential forderiving incentive mechanisms to promote peer cooperation and systemrobustness in a P2P system, and proposes to incorporate these pro-incentive parameters in information exchanges in the P2P streamingprotocols to be specified, e.g., in the tracker protocol proposed in[draft-gu-ppsp-tracker-protocol], and in the future in the peerprotocol proposed in [draft-gu-ppsp-peer-protocol].
